name: Love Cats Rope
description:
Love Cats Rope - romantic game about kittens
Draw lines with your finger to make cute kittens, like balls in love, roll towards each other
Each level is a new puzzle. Can you find the shortest solution? Use the tips and learn how to tie cute kittens with a rope of love.
Features:
- Play for free wherever and whenever you want
- The app will appeal to all, for any age
- Easy control, just draw with your finger
- Interesting levels and riddles that you need to think about
- Collect happy kittens, colored balls and beautiful backgrounds
- Good anti-stress, like sequins and slimes
Start the game and immerse yourself in the magical world of love and cats.
You are waiting for a simple and complex tests for your mind!
